ExternalServiceRegistration.label: ARC101EmployeesExtService
ExternalServiceRegistration.schema: {"openapi":"3.0.3","info":{"title":"Employees","version":"1.0","description":"A simple REST API for providing basic CRUD-access to the employees in a dummy
